title: Hi, I'm John
about-me: I'm an undergraduate studying Computer Science BSc at Durham University. I have 4 years of developing experience from web to mobile and even to desktop.

project-items.northumberlandchess-bio: A local chess association wanted me to redesign their site to attract more visitors to read about the chess news in the region
project-items.leoallan-bio: A local photographer and videographer wanted a website to display all his artistic work
project-items.moomingame-bio: A game based on the Finnish Moomin series where Moomintroll has to find a lost friend
project-items.quicksong-bio: A music playing app to allow users to play music offline and online
